name: Bombers (GAMERSUNITE)
description:
A really short 2D Platformer game for the GameBoy Game Jam. Get to the top of the tower, place a bomb and run away before you explode!

QUICK NOTE:

You can change the resolution of the screen while playing. The default resolution is the normal GameBoy one but if you aren't comfortable with it feel free to resize the window.

ANOTHER WARNING:

This is NOT fully "GameBoy" because there's some mouse inputs on buttons just to make navigation a bit more comfortable before playing the actual game.
